name: Shooting Test (Feedback)
description:
Shooting Test (Feedback)

GDD coming later when i gain access to it again

Short "game" i made withing 8-12 hours for a school project in 2nd year

Focus of game was implementation of raycast, UI and the aspect of game polish, mainly audio

also has Nav mesh implementation

WASD - movement

Left click - shoot

Right click - aim

R - reload

Shift - sprint

Spacebar - jump

Auto reloads after shooting empty clip a couple of times
